roleset.name: cause an event
roleset.note: PROMPT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'prompt' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No comparison. (from prompt.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: prompt-v: caused event
example.text: Mr. Edelman declined to specify what *trace* prompted the recent moves

roleset.name: bring about, cause
roleset.note: PROMPT-V NOTES: VN class force-59. (from prompt.02-v)

example.name: prompt-v: impelled action as PP
example.text: But the next important piece of news on the economy's health -- this morning's release of the national purchasing manager's survey for October -- could prompt investors into action.
example.arg: the next important piece of news on the economy's health -- this morning's release of the national purchasing manager's survey for October --

example.name: prompt-v: more commonly as VP
example.text: According to the Value Line Investment Survey, [demand for Nekoosa's commodity paper]-1 has weakened, *trace*-1 prompting earnings to decline by 6.6% in the third quarter ended Sept. 30.
example.arg: to decline by 6.6% in the third quarter ended Sept. 30

example.name: prompting-n
example.text: Comprehension : can follow directions with minimal prompting , repetition .

roleset.name: give the next line
roleset.note: PROMPT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'prompt' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No comparison. (from prompt.03-v predicate notes)

example.name: prompt-v: duh
example.text: John could never remember his lines, so Mary had to prompt him every time.
